comment.author: 32193092@N02
comment._content: I would suggest that the siding referred to is "Oorindi", which is approx 60km east of Cloncurry, on the railway line to Townsville.  This one must have slipped through the net, other SLQ images of Cooyal have the correct spelling.

comment.author: 47237602@N04
comment._content: Yes agreed with john... its definately Oorindi

comment.author: 32605636@N06
comment._content:
Thanks John and Ashleigh for pointing this out.  It is great to have input from those with knowledge of the regions. 

John, apologies for the very extended delay in responding to your suggestion. I will have this amended in our catalogue record.

Kate
(for State Library of Queensland)
